detail_desc: Suede mules with decorative flower appliqués at the front, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 2 cm.
Suede slides with a bow at the front, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 2 cm.

Slip-on trainers in imitation suede with an embroidered appliqué. Faux fur linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Trousers in a soft knit with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly with decorative buttons, and ribbed hems.
Jumper in a soft cable knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer, stocking-stitched back.
Jumper in a soft cable knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer, stocking-stitched back.
Baby Exclusive. Hairbands in an organic cotton weave with a bow.

Microfibre bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and a fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a wide fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes. The bra is low-cut at the front so that it can be worn invisibly under garments with a deep neckline.

Super push-up bras in microfibre with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Suede ballet pumps with a scalloped edge and strap with a hook and loop fastener. Cotton linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Baby Exclusive. Suede loafers with a seam at the front and loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Suede sandals with cork midsoles and straps with hook and loop fastenings. Imitation suede linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Detachable tie belt at the waist.
Fitted, sleeveless jumpsuit in stretch jersey with wide, elastic shoulder straps that cross over at the back and a contrasting colour panel down the sides.
V-neck jumpsuit in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist, pockets in the side seams and slightly wider straight legs.

Knee-length dress in an airy, patterned weave with a tie collar and an opening at the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck at the back and horizontal strap with a button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length sleeves with a drawstring and ties at the cuffs, and a gently bell-shaped skirt with a seam and frill at the hem. Unlined.

Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck at the back and horizontal strap with a button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length sleeves with a drawstring and ties at the cuffs, and a gently bell-shaped skirt with a seam and frill at the hem. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a round neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Spotted mesh frills at the top, waist and down the sleeves. Sewn-in jersey underdress.
Short dress in ribbed jersey with 3/4-length sleeves, smooth jersey panels at the sides, a seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.

Coat in a sturdy weave with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and a loose yoke with a pleat at the back. Side pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and long sleeves with a narrow tab and press-stud at the cuffs. Lined.
